register-start.en:
I get your register request,
Send below command on group or channel you want to register on it:
/reg %{userId}
or send /cancelReg to cancel registration!

register-request-confirm.en:
Please confirm your registration with a unique name (you can't change it anymore),
To confirm it just send /confirm your-unique-name
or to cancel it just send /cancel.

register-confirm-success.en: Registration confirmed, The new name is: %{chatKey}

register-confirm-failed.en:
The entered name was exists, try another one
Please confirm it with a unique name (you can't change it anymore),
To confirm it just send /confirm your-unique-name
or to cancel it just send /cancelReg.

register-not-started.en:
You are not on registration!
Use /help to read more.

newPost-start.en: New %{templateName} was createdğŸ‘, Please answer the questions to fill the fields of new post

newPost-ready.en:
This post is Ready to send
Now you can use /sendTo channelKey or /sendTo groupKey commands to send this post to channel or group
Or /preview to see a preview of your post

newPost-not-ready.en:
This post is not ready to send!
Please fill all the fields

newPost-is-empty.en:
